gui.item_merging.title: Item Merging
hud.message.item_merging.container_stack: Found no item to merge into.
hud.message.item_merging.not_allowed_to_: You currently can't merge items into %s.
hud.message.item_merging.item_can_not_be: %s can't be merged into other items.
hud.message.item_merging.merged_item_sta:
%s has merged items into it.
It can't be merged into other items.
hud.message.item_merging.items_can_not_b: It's not possible to merge items into %s.
hud.message.item_merging.item_has_reache: %s has reached the current maximum amount of merged items.
hud.message.item_splitting.extract_slot_: No space for extracting merged items.
mergeditems.client.show_inactive_invento: Show Inactive Slots On Item Merging Screen

Inventory Attribute Size Compatibility Setting

When set to 'false', inactive slots will not be shown.
mergeditems.server.merging_averages_simi:
When set to 'false', merging items will add up all their modifiers.

When set to 'true', similar modifiers (same id, same slot, same operation) will be averaged.
